channel.title: Comments on: 10 things I loved about Kenya

item.title: By: henry kimathi
item.dc:creator: henry kimathi
item.description: Lamu always has a way of capturing the traveller's heart in such a lasting way that for most, the first time there is never enough and so you will always hear travellers say things like "this is my third time here and i will be back (that phrase is apparently not only reserved for Arnold Schwarzenegger, you will quickly realise while in Lamu). Great collection of travel ideas there Sarah. Cannot wait to go back to Lamu yet again myself despite a couple of stories about the place on our travel blog.
item.content:encoded: Lamu always has a way of capturing the traveller’s heart in such a lasting way that for most, the first time there is never enough and so you will always hear travellers say things like “this is my third time here and i will be back (that phrase is apparently not only reserved for Arnold Schwarzenegger, you will quickly realise while in Lamu). Great collection of travel ideas there Sarah. Cannot wait to go back to Lamu yet again myself despite a couple of stories about the place on our travel blog.

item.title: By: wawuda carol
item.dc:creator: wawuda carol
item.description: i live at the coast near Lamu and study in rift valley, but originate from the park. welcone again, we love you all, karibuni tena.
item.content:encoded:
i live at the coast near Lamu and study in rift valley, but originate from the park.
welcone again, we love you all, karibuni tena.

item.title: By: Bronwyn
item.dc:creator: Bronwyn
item.description: What a lovely article - beautiful photos and honest reflections, but then again Kenya is as wonderful as it looks - especially the Masai Mara and their carefree culture :)
item.content:encoded: What a lovely article – beautiful photos and honest reflections, but then again Kenya is as wonderful as it looks – especially the Masai Mara and their carefree culture ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Roxanne Reid
item.dc:creator: Roxanne Reid
item.description: Way to make a girl feel envious! Great list that showcases Kenya's diversity. And now I'm going off to day-dream for a bit about that Peponi Hotel...
item.content:encoded: Way to make a girl feel envious! Great list that showcases Kenya’s diversity. And now I’m going off to day-dream for a bit about that Peponi Hotel…

item.title: By: Kerry
item.dc:creator: Kerry
item.description: Love this! I have always been intrigued by the east coast of Africa, never made it further up than Inhambane in Mozambique but those images of Lamu Island are calling my name... so beautiful.
item.content:encoded: Love this! I have always been intrigued by the east coast of Africa, never made it further up than Inhambane in Mozambique but those images of Lamu Island are calling my name… so beautiful.

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/10-things-loved-kenya/#comment-468">Marisa</a>.
Hi Marisa,
You definitely need to go back for Lamu Island! I'm sure I'm missing a lot more points from my list - so I'll also have to go back :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Marisa.

Hi Marisa,

You definitely need to go back for Lamu Island! I’m sure I’m missing a lot more points from my list – so I’ll also have to go back ðŸ™‚
